ValidationRule.description: Assoc Contact & Assoc Partner required for JPM leads to be converted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , "Qualified"), ISPICKVAL( LeadSourceDetail__c , "JPM"), (OR( ISBLANK( Associated_Contact__c ), ISBLANK( Associated_Partner__c ))))&& Eligible_for_Contact_Merge__c = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Both the Associated Contact and Associated Partner are required to convert this lead
